effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
The user bites with
cold-infused fangs.
It may also make the
foe flinch or freeze.

The user bites with
cold-infused fangs.
It may also make the
foe flinch or freeze.

The user bites with
cold-infused fangs.
It may also make the
foe flinch or freeze.

Le lanceur utilise une morsure glaciale.
Peut aussi geler ou apeurer l’ennemi.

The user bites with cold-infused fangs.
It may also make the target flinch or
leave it frozen.

The user bites with cold-infused fangs.
It may also make the target flinch or
leave it frozen.

れいきを　ひめた　キバで　かみつく。
あいてを　ひるませたり
こおり　じょうたいに　することが　ある。

냉기를 품은 이빨로 문다.
상대를 풀죽게 하거나
얼음 상태로 만들 때가 있다.

Le lanceur utilise une morsure glaciale.
Peut aussi geler ou apeurer l’ennemi.

Anwender beißt mit eiskalten Reißzähnen zu.
Ziel schreckt eventuell zurück oder friert ein.

Usa colmillos helados para morder. Puede hacer
que el objetivo retroceda o se congele.

Chi la usa morde con denti ghiacciati. Può anche
congelare o far tentennare il bersaglio.

The user bites with cold-infused fangs.
This may also make the target flinch or
leave it frozen.

冷気を　ひめた　キバで　かみつく。
相手を　ひるませたり
こおり状態に　することが　ある。
